    • Method Detail

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade()
        This method is used to upgrade the level of a specific tower. Check whether the currency of a user is enough to upgrade that tower. If it is enough, upgrade the tower and reduce user's currency.
        See Also:
        TowerManager.upgrade(Tower)

      • sell

        public void sell()
        The method is used to sell an existing tower. Add the sell price of the tower to a user's currency, then remove the tower from the map.

      • attack

        public void attack()
        The attack method of Tower
